replies.body: Your security settings or antivirus might be preventing your game files from being accessed or installed properly.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access.  You may then need to grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a force repatch and fix potentially bad files.  I hope that helps!
